Title: Stick
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Douglas Petrie, Luke Kalteux (story editor), Christos N. Gage (staff writer), Ruth Fletcher (staff writer)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Vondie Curtis-Hall
Plot: An important figure from Murdock's past reemerges seeking his help to battle a new enemy threatening Hell's Kitchen.
